Html: Is it possible to have a "continuous" map, that is for example when you move the map on the right, after china, Americas are displayed? (so we could take a screenshot with china on the left, americas in the center, and europe, russia on the right)
it would be nice, but it isn't implemented yet

Would it be complicated?

Could you give me a clue to where I should look in the code to implement this?
if it would easy it would be available already ;}
